verses.verse: וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> departed דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> David מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there וַיִּמָּלֵ֖ט <WH4422> thence and escaped אֶל־ <WH413> to מְעָרַ֣ת <WH4631> to the cave עֲדֻלָּ֑ם <WH5725> Adullam וַיִּשְׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> heard אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> and when his brethren וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֔יו <WH1> and all his father's וַיֵּרְד֥וּ <WH3381> [it] they went down אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּֽתְקַבְּצ֣וּ <WH6908> gathered אֵ֠לָיו <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> Everyone אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> And every one מָצ֜וֹק <WH4689> [that was] in distress וְכָל־ <WH3605> and everyone אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> and every one אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who ל֤וֹ נֹשֶׁא֙ <WH5378> that [was] in debt וְכָל־ <WH3605> and everyone אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and every one מַר־ <WH4751> angry נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> and he וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> became עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over לְשָׂ֑ר <WH8269> themselves unto him and he became a captain וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> became עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> were about כְּאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> over them and there were with him about four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> went דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> And David מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there מִצְפֵּ֣ה <WH4708> thence to Mizpeh מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> and he said אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king מוֹאָ֗ב <WH4124> of Moab יֵֽצֵא־ <WH3318> I pray thee come forth נָ֞א <WH4994> Please אָבִ֤י <WH1> Let my father וְאִמִּי֙ <WH517> and my mother אִתְּכֶ֔ם <WH854> for עַ֚ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I אֵדַ֔ע <WH3045> [and be] with you till I know מַה־ <WH4100> what יַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> will do לִּ֖י אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> what God

וַיַּנְחֵ֕ם <WH5148> And he brought אֶת־ <WH854> for פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> them before מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> and they dwelt עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> with him all the while הֱיוֹת־ <WH1961> become דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> that David בַּמְּצוּדָֽה׃ <WH4686> was in the hold ס

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said גָּ֨ד <WH1410> Gad הַנָּבִ֜יא <WH5030> And the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> unto David לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תֵשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> Abide בַּמְּצוּדָ֔ה <WH4686> not in the hold לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> depart וּבָֽאתָ־ <WH935> and get לְּךָ֖ אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> thee into the land יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> departed דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> Then David וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came יַ֥עַר <WH3293> into the forest חָֽרֶת׃ <WH2802> of Hareth ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> When Saul כִּ֚י <WH3588> for נוֹדַ֣ע <WH3045> was discovered דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> that David וַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> and the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for וְשָׁאוּל֩ <WH7586> that [were] with him (now Saul יוֹשֵׁ֨ב <WH3427> abode בַּגִּבְעָ֜ה <WH1390> in Gibeah תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> under הָאֶ֤שֶׁל <WH815> under a tree בָּֽרָמָה֙ <WH7413> the height וַחֲנִית֣וֹ <WH2595> having his spear בְיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> and all his servants נִצָּבִ֥ים <WH5324> [were] standing עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> around

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> Then Saul לַֽעֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> unto his servants הַנִּצָּבִ֣ים <WH5324> that stood עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> around שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> about him Hear now נָ֖א <WH4994> now בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> will the son יְמִינִ֑י <WH3227> right גַּם־ <WH1571> also לְכֻלְּכֶ֗ם <WH3605> to all יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> give בֶּן־ <WH1121> will the son יִשַׁי֙ <WH3448> of Jesse שָׂד֣וֹת <WH7704> every one of you fields וּכְרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> and vineyards לְכֻלְּכֶ֣ם <WH3605> all יָשִׂ֔ים <WH7760> [and] make שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> you all captains אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> of thousands וְשָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and captains מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> of hundreds

כִּי֩ <WH3588> of you קְשַׁרְתֶּ֨ם <WH7194> That all of you have conspired כֻּלְּכֶ֜ם <WH3605> for all עָלַ֗י <WH5921> against וְאֵין־ <WH369> there גֹּלֶ֤ה <WH1540> discloses אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנִי֙ <WH241> hearing בִּכְרָת־ <WH3772> hath made a league בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> me that my son עִם־ <WH5973> with בֶּן־ <WH1121> with the son יִשַׁ֔י <WH3448> of Jesse וְאֵין־ <WH369> is no חֹלֶ֥ה <WH2470> and [there is] none of you that is sorry מִכֶּ֛ם <WH4480> at עָלַ֖י <WH5921> against וְגֹלֶ֣ה <WH1540> discloses אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנִ֑י <WH241> hearing כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הֵקִים֩ <WH6965> hath stirred up בְּנִ֨י <WH1121> unto me that my son אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדִּ֥י <WH5650> my servant עָלַ֛י <WH5921> against לְאֹרֵ֖ב <WH693> against me to lie in wait כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס

וַיַּ֜עַן <WH6030> Then answered דֹּאֵ֣ג <WH1673> Doeg הָאֲדֹמִ֗י <WH130> the Edomite וְה֛וּא <WH1931> who נִצָּ֥ב <WH5324> which was set עַל־ <WH5921> by עַבְדֵֽי־ <WH5650> over the servants שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> of Saul וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> I saw אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִשַׁ֔י <WH3448> of Jesse בָּ֣א <WH935> coming נֹ֔בֶה <WH5011> to Nob אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲחִימֶ֖לֶךְ <WH288> to Ahimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִטֽוּב׃ <WH285> of Ahitub

וַיִּשְׁאַל־ <WH7592> And he enquired לוֹ֙ בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְצֵידָ֖ה <WH6720> him victuals נָ֣תַן <WH5414> for him and gave ל֑וֹ וְאֵ֗ת <WH853> חֶ֛רֶב <WH2719> him the sword גָּלְיָ֥ת <WH1555> of Goliath הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH6430> the Philistine נָ֥תַן <WH5414> and gave לֽוֹ׃

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king לִקְרֹא֩ <WH7121> to call אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִימֶ֨לֶךְ <WH288> Ahimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיט֜וּב <WH285> of Ahitub הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> the priest וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֛יו <WH1> and all his father's הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּנֹ֑ב <WH5011> that [were] in Nob וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> and they came כֻלָּ֖ם <WH3605> and all אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> all of them to the king ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And Saul שְֽׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֖א <WH4994> now בֶּן־ <WH1121> now thou son אֲחִיט֑וּב <WH285> of Ahitub וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he answered הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> Here I [am] my lord

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said [אֵלֹו כ] (אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> against ק) שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And Saul לָ֚מָּה <WH4100> Why קְשַׁרְתֶּ֣ם <WH7194> unto him Why have ye conspired עָלַ֔י <WH5921> against אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> have you וּבֶן־ <WH1121> against me thou and the son יִשָׁ֑י <WH3448> of Jesse בְּתִתְּךָ֨ <WH5414> in that thou hast given ל֜וֹ לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> him bread וְחֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> and a sword וְשָׁא֥וֹל <WH7592> and hast enquired לוֹ֙ בֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God לָק֥וּם <WH6965> for him that he should rise אֵלַ֛י <WH413> against לְאֹרֵ֖ב <WH693> against me to lie in wait כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> age הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס

וַיַּ֧עַן <WH6030> answered אֲחִימֶ֛לֶךְ <WH288> Then Ahimelech אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said וּמִ֤י <WH4310> and who בְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> among all thy servants כְּדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> as David נֶאֱמָ֔ן <WH539> And who [is so] faithful וַחֲתַ֥ן <WH2860> son in law הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> which is the king's וְסָ֥ר <WH5493> and goeth אֶל־ <WH413> over מִשְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ךָ <WH4928> at thy bidding וְנִכְבָּ֥ד <WH3513> and is honourable בְּבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1004> court

הַיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> Did I then הַחִלֹּ֛תִי <WH2490> begin [לְשָׁאֹול־ כ] (לִשְׁאָל־ <WH7592> to inquire ל֥וֹ <WH7592> to enquire ק) בֵאלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God חָלִ֣ילָה <WH2486> for him? be it far from me לִּ֑י אַל־ <WH408> nay יָשֵׂם֩ <WH7760> impute הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> let not the king בְּעַבְדּ֤וֹ <WH5650> unto his servant דָבָר֙ <WH1697> [any] thing בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [nor] to all the house אָבִ֔י <WH1> of my father כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nothing יָדַ֤ע <WH3045> knew עַבְדְּךָ֙ <WH5650> for thy servant בְּכָל־ <WH3605> whole זֹ֔את <WH2063> likewise דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> nothing קָטֹ֖ן <WH6996> of all this less א֥וֹ <WH176> or גָדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> or more

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Thou shalt surely תָּמ֖וּת <WH4191> die אֲחִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH288> Ahimelech אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽיךָ׃ <WH1> thou and all thy father's

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king לָרָצִים֩ <WH7323> unto the footmen הַנִּצָּבִ֨ים <WH5324> that stood עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> and סֹ֥בּוּ <WH5437> about him Turn וְהָמִ֣יתוּ ׀ <WH4191> and slay כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <WH3548> the priests יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> because גַם־ <WH1571> also יָדָם֙ <WH3027> because their hand עִם־ <WH5973> is with דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> also [is] with David וְכִ֤י <WH3588> and because יָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> and because they knew כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because בֹרֵ֣חַ <WH1272> when he fled ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not גָל֖וּ <WH1540> advertise אֶת־ <WH853> [אָזְנֹו כ] (אָזְנִ֑י <WH241> hearing ק) וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> were not אָב֞וּ <WH14> would עַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> it to me But the servants הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king לִשְׁלֹ֣חַ <WH7971> not put forth אֶת־ <WH853> יָדָ֔ם <WH3027> their hand לִפְגֹ֖עַ <WH6293> to fall בְּכֹהֲנֵ֥י <WH3548> upon the priests יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> And the king [לְדֹויֵג כ] (לְדֹואֵ֔ג <WH1673> Doeg ק) סֹ֣ב <WH5437> Turn אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you וּפְגַ֖ע <WH6293> thou and fall בַּכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> upon the priests וַיִּסֹּ֞ב <WH5437> turned [דֹּויֵג כ] (דֹּואֵ֣ג <WH1673> Doeg ק) הָאֲדֹמִ֗י <WH130> the Edomite וַיִּפְגַּע־ <WH6293> and he fell הוּא֙ <WH1931> he בַּכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> upon the priests וַיָּ֣מֶת ׀ <WH4191> and slew בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he שְׁמֹנִ֤ים <WH8084> fourscore וַחֲמִשָּׁה֙ <WH2568> and five אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> persons נֹשֵׂ֖א <WH5375> that did wear אֵפ֥וֹד <WH646> ephod בָּֽד׃ <WH906> a linen

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> נֹ֤ב <WH5011> And Nob עִיר־ <WH5892> the city הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> of the priests הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> smote לְפִי־ <WH6310> he with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> of the sword מֵאִישׁ֙ <WH376> both men וְעַד־ <WH5704> against אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> and women מֵעוֹלֵ֖ל <WH5768> children וְעַד־ <WH5704> against יוֹנֵ֑ק <WH3243> and sucklings וְשׁ֧וֹר <WH7794> and oxen וַחֲמ֛וֹר <WH2543> and asses וָשֶׂ֖ה <WH7716> and sheep לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> of the sword

וַיִּמָּלֵ֣ט <WH4422> escaped בֵּן־ <WH1121> of the sons אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> And one לַאֲחִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH288> of Ahimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִט֔וּב <WH285> of Ahitub וּשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> named אֶבְיָתָ֑ר <WH54> Abiathar וַיִּבְרַ֖ח <WH1272> and fled אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after דָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> David
